coupon_text: Free PediaSure shake chocolate flavour samples (delivered free too). Use the Get offer button at the bottom of this page to order yours.(PaediaSure Shake is a delicious, nutritious supplement drink for children aged 1-10 years, to support their growth and development)PaediaSure Shake is packed with protein, omega 3 & 6 and a whopping 26 vitamins and minerals – to help support your child’s growth* and immunity – that’s over three times the number of nutrients than the leading kids’ multivitamin brand. And with three kid approved flavours to choose from, they’ll love the taste, and you’ll love the peace of mind.
